Throws a Trident that turns any blocks it collides with
into a temporary form of Shimmerglass. This Trident has
built-in Loyalty and causes an explosion of Shimmerglass
when it lands or comes in contact with an entity. Attack
damage and maximum block conversions scale with item tier.
item.bitsofbox.fluidity.tooltip.axe.1: Stripping logs with this Axe has a 1/32 chance to drop one
item.bitsofbox.fluidity.tooltip.axe.2: Shimmer Powder. This event is impossible if you have already
item.bitsofbox.fluidity.tooltip.axe.bord: Stripping logs with this Axe has a 1/100 chance to drop one
Shimmer Powder. Obtaining Shimmer Powder this way does not
count towards your daily three-powder obtainment limit.
Throws this Pickaxe in front of you, breaking blocks it comes
in contact with. After a set number of ticks, the "Pickarang" will
fly back to the position you threw it from. If you are within 8
blocks of the pickaxe when it returns, you pick it up immediately.
tip.bitsofbox.wait_to_collect_shimmer_po: I need to wait for a new dawn to collect more Shimmer Powder.
death.attack.pickarang: %s was cracked in the head by %s's pickaxe
death.attack.pickarang.item: %s was cracked in the head by %s with %s
death.attack.fluidity_trident: %s was impaled into another reality by %s
death.attack.fluidity_trident.item: %s was impaled into another reality by %s with %s
enchantment.bitsofbox.borderlinked.desc: The chance of Shimmer Powder dropping from logs stripped with Fluidity is decreased. In return, obtaining Shimmer Powder in this way no longer counts towards your daily limit.
enchantment.bitsofbox.shimmerseep.desc: Fluidity passively regains one charge every two minutes. All items with this enchantment regain charges at the same time.
